pkgmetadata.longdescription: Translate Models from System Dynamics Software into 'R' // The goal of 'readsdr' is to bridge the design capabilities from specialised System Dynamics software with the powerful numerical tools offered by 'R' libraries. The package accomplishes this goal by parsing 'XMILE' files ('Vensim' and 'Stella') models into 'R' objects to construct networks (graph theory); 'ODE' functions for 'Stan'; and inputs to simulate via 'deSolve' as described in Duggan (2016) doi:10.1007/978-3-319-34043-2.
